Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| --- |
| NDI (conjugated copolymer) |
| bithiophene |
| polymeric dielectrics |

Note that I have presented the entities exactly as they appear in the original paragraph, including any proper nouns or capitalization.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| NDI (conjugated copolymer) |
| bithiophene |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "top-gate" (this is a device configuration, not a material name)
* "bottom-contact" (this is a device configuration, not a material name)
* "polymeric dielectrics" (while this is a material, it is not referred to as a "Material name" in the paragraph)
